about_the_game:
Enter the abandoned halls of an old prison, where a routine repair job turns into a fight for survival. As an experienced worker, you were sent to fix a facility slated for reopening. But as you explore the eerie, deserted corridors, you quickly realize that you’re not alone. Armed mercenaries have taken over, and they’re determined to keep you from leaving alive.

Key Features:

Intense Stealth and Combat: Navigate through the prison’s tight corridors and open yards, using a combination of stealth and firearms to survive. Every bullet counts, and every decision could mean life or death.

Environmental Puzzles: Repair damaged systems, find keys, and unlock doors to progress. Use your tools wisely to navigate this treacherous environment filled with traps and hidden dangers.

Immersive Atmosphere: Feel the tension rise as you delve deeper into the prison. The flickering lights, distant sounds, and unsettling quiet create a nerve-wracking experience that keeps you on edge.

Dynamic AI Enemies: Face off against mercenaries with varying tactics. Some will hunt you down aggressively, while others might set traps or try to outflank you. Be prepared for anything.

Mystery Unfolds: Discover cryptic notes and clues left behind by previous workers, revealing the dark history of the prison and the truth behind the takeover.

Can you survive the horrors lurking within these cold, stone walls? Prepare for a thrilling experience that will test your wits, your aim, and your nerve.

name: Death Row Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game runs on this system at medium quality. If the game runs on a lower system than this, please let me know. Thank you.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

reviews:
“Turkish solo indie game developer Sercan EVYAPAN might have created something special with "Death Row Escape". Made in Unreal Engine, the title has horror, shooter, and stealth elements, along with environmental puzzles and unique enemy AI. Intrigued? You can give the brand-new demo a try here on”
Hitmarker | Gaming Jobs
short_description: Trapped in a deadly time loop, escape a high security prison through the lens of a bodycam. Fight mercenaries, face terrifying creatures, uncover dark truths, and solve puzzles in this intense horror shooter.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
